subject: Web3
title: Decentralized Exchanges
description: A quick win: understand Decentralized Exchanges.

hook.text: Uniswap lets you trade crypto without a company in the middle. It's a vending machine run by code.

buildup.text: Traditional exchanges match buyers and sellers using order books. DEXs use liquidity pools instead.

discovery.text: Anyone can deposit tokens into a pool and earn trading fees. You become the exchange.

twist.text: Providing liquidity isn't free. 'Impermanent loss' can eat into your earnings if token prices shift.

climax.text: Uniswap handles billions in daily volume with no CEO, no headquarters, and about 50 employees.

punchline.text: A 50-person team built an exchange that rivals Wall Street.

quiz.question: How do decentralized exchanges like Uniswap work?
options: Liquidity pools where anyone can deposit tokens
